abstract: Charley Hoffman wins Valero Texas Open, marking his fourth PGA Tour victory; other golf news noted.

headline.main: Charley Hoffman Wins on Final Hole at Texas Open

snippet: Hoffman made a 9-foot birdie putt on the final hole to win the Valero Texas Open. Hoffman closed with a three-under 69 at TPC San Antonio.
lead_paragraph: Hoffman made a 9-foot birdie putt on the final hole to win the Valero Texas Open. Hoffman closed with a three-under 69 at TPC San Antonio.
